fuzzydl.milp

Class MILPHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • fuzzydl.milp.MILPHelper

  • public class MILPHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    MILP problem manager, storing the problem and calling an external solver.
    Author:
    Fernando Bobillo

      • addNewConstraint

        public void addNewConstraint(Expression expr,
                    char constraintType,
                    Degree degree)
        Adds a new inequality of the form: expr constraintType degree.
        Parameters:
        expr - An expression in the left side of the inequality.
        constraintType - Type of the constraint (EQ, GR, LE).
        degree - A degree in the right side of the inequality.

        Parameters:
        expr - An expression in the left side of the inequality.
        constraintType - Type of the constraint (EQ, GR, LE).
        n - A real number expression in the right side of the inequality.

      • getOrderedPermutation

        public Variable[] getOrderedPermutation(Variable[] x,
                               Variable[][] z)
        Gets an ordered permutation of the variables.
        Parameters:
        x - A vector of input variables.
        z - A matrix of intermediate variables.
        Returns:
        A permutation of the input variables such that y[0] ≥= y[1] ≥= ... ≥= y[n-1]
